title: Secrets of war leadership
itunes:title: Secrets of war leadership
itunes:subtitle: Andrew Roberts reflects on some of the greatest and most nefarious war leaders of the past and considers what traits they shared. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian Andrew Roberts reflects on some of the greatest and most nefarious war leaders of the past – including Napoleon, Hitler, Churchill and Eisenhower – and considers what traits they shared. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
